entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Stony Rapids
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:44 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -35.0°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 32 with temperature rising to minus 25 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32 with temperature rising to minus 25 by morning. Wind chill minus 44 this evening. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the morning and ending in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
